name: SillyTavern System
mes: Group chat created. Say 'Hi' to lovely people!

name: Melissa Sparda
mes: Well, I almost don't believe it! If it isn't the legendary, 4th wall breaking, Deadpool himself!

name: Wade Wilson
mes:
*Wade perks up, his eyes widening behind his red mask as he recognizes the new arrival at the bar*, "Well slap my ass and call me Sally, if it ain't Melissa Sparda herself! What's a classy dame like you doing in a dive like this?" *He pats the empty barstool next to him*, "Come on over here and park that gorgeous caboose next to your ol' pal Wade!"

*As Melissa walks over, Wade ogles her unabashedly*, "Damn girl, look at you! I haven't seen curves like that since the last time I watched Jessica Rabbit!"

*He grins and motions to Atreyu for another drink for his friend*, "Seriously though, it's great to see you Mel. It's been, what, a few weeks since that shit-show mission in the Amazon? Hope things have been less crazy for you since then. I heard through the grape vine that you and the big V got hitched! Congrats!"

*He raises his glass*, "A toast to the blushing bride! May your lives together be filled with happiness, rainbows, and hopefully no accidental stabbings." *He pauses and tilts his head* "Well, unless you're into that sort of thing, no judgement here!"

*He raises his glass*, "A toast to the blushing bride! May your lives together be filled with happiness, rainbows, and hopefully no accidental stabbings." *He pauses and tilts his head* "Well, unless you're into that sort of thing, no judgement here!"

name: Melissa Sparda
mes:
*Melissa laughs lightly, placing her hands on her hips as she leans closer to Wade, a playful glint in her blue eyes.* Well, if it isn’t Wade Wilson, the king of chaos himself! *She rolls her eyes dramatically before smirking.* You sure know how to make a gal feel special, don’t ya?

*She settles onto the barstool, crossing her legs with a flick of her long blonde hair.* Yeah, things have been a whirlwind since the Amazon mission. You know how it is—one day you're neck-deep in demon guts, the next you’re planning a wedding.

*She gestures to Atreyu, flashing her captivating smile.* I’ll take one of those Hellfire Highballs. Gotta keep things interesting, right? *Turning back to Wade, her playful demeanor softens, the warmth in her gaze genuine.*

And you bet your ass I’m glad to see you! It's always a good time when you’re around. Just don’t go getting any ideas about crashing our honeymoon phase. *She chuckles, leaning back, her confidence radiating.*

*Her tone shifts slightly, a hint of curiosity lacing her words.* So, what’s new? Any epic adventures or crazy shenanigans I should know about? *She leans in closer, eager to hear more about Wade’s latest exploits, her interest piqued by the unpredictable nature of the mercenary.*

name: Wade Wilson
mes:
*Wade grins behind his mask as Melissa settles onto the barstool, clearly enjoying the view as she crosses her long, shapely legs. He lets out an exaggerated wolf whistle, leaning back as if to get a better look before Atreyu pointedly clears her throat. Wade holds up his hands defensively before turning his attention back to his drink*

"A Hellfire Highball, good choice! Packs one hell of a punch, just like the sexy senorita ordering it!"

*He takes a long pull from his beer as Melissa asks what crazy adventures he's been on lately, smacking his lips before replying*

"Oh you know, same old really. Killed some bad guys, saved some not-so-bad guys. Got my ass royally kicked by Wolverine last week over that thing with the cherry bombs in the Danger Room. Totally worth it though just to see the look on Cyclops' face when they went off."

*He snickers at the memory before continuing*

"Let's see, what else...  Ooh I got to briefly team up with Spiderman last month to take down the Green Goblin, that was fun. We got some killer tacos after. Oh man, I gotta take you to that place next time you're in New York! They even do chimichangas!"

*He pauses to take another swig of beer before turning to Melissa with a grin stretching under his mask*

"But enough about little old me, let's talk about you and tall, pale and gruesome! Never thought I'd see the day when Vergil settled down. You must have worked some kinda voodoo magic on him girl!"

*He leans in conspiratorially*

"So tell me, is he as kinky behind closed doors as I imagine? Don't leave out any of the steamy details now, inquiring minds want to know!"
swipes:
*Wade grins behind his mask as Melissa settles onto the barstool next to him, his gaze trailing appreciatively over her curves before snapping back to meet her dazzling blue eyes.*

"Well now, if it isn't Red Grave City's newest blushing bride gracing us lowlifes with her presence!" *He chuckles, raising his glass in salute.* "Here's to you and Vergil and hoping he at least springs for silk sheets for your wedding night escapades!"

*At her mention of their previous mission, Wade nods, his tone turning uncharacteristically serious.* "Yeah, the Amazon was a real shitstorm. Still having the occasional nightmare about those giant spider-demons bursting out of the trees. But I'm glad to see you made it out in one piece... a very sexy piece at that!"

*He waggles his non-existent eyebrows at her over his mask before his usual irreverence returns.* "And you bet that fine ass of yours I got up to some crazy adventures since then! Let's see... " *He taps his chin thoughtfully.* "I died... again. Got my limbs torn off by a horde of zombies in New Orleans. Oh! And I finally banged one of my fantasy chick's - Rogue from the X-men! Turns out her absorption power makes for a"
